document_data.name: Neddy
document_data.deathnotes: Executed by Sir Banagar, on the order of Javen Tarmikos
document_data.mainbody: '''Neddy''' was a member of the [[Order of the Burning Dawn]] in the late 15{{th}} century.
document_data.History: Sometime around {{Yearlink|1490}}, Neddy, along with fellow members of the Burning Dawn [[Gill]], [[Calick]], and [[Bryn Lightfingers]], was escorting a merchant caravan along the [[High Road]] between [[Neverwinter]] and [[Luskan]], when the caravan was ambushed by the [[Snarling Fang]] mercenary company. The members of the Burning Dawn were brought to the hideout of the mercenaries, and killed. Accused of being [[demon]]s of the [[Abyss]], Neddy and [[Gill]] were both executed by [[Banagar|Sir Banagar]], who carried out the sentence with a sword on the order of [[Javen Tarmikos]].
